text: Daniel F. Whitcomb (1875–1944) was an American screenwriter of the silent era.Langman p.24 ==Selected filmography== * Sold at Auction (1917) * Told at Twilight (1917) * The Bride's Silence (1917) * A Game of Wits (1917) * The Locked Heart (1918) * Rosemary Climbs the Heights (1918) * The Blue Moon (1920) * The House of Toys (1920) * Their Mutual Child (1921) * Sunset Jones (1921) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Langman, Larry. A Guide to Silent Westerns. Greenwood Publishing Group, 1992. ==External links== * Category:1875 births Category:1944 deaths Category:20th-century American screenwriters
title: Daniel F. Whitcomb
